snippet: This Poetry Pairing matches "Full Flight" with by Bob Hicok with "At Ground Zero, Readers Offer Plain-Spoken Tributes to Those Lost," an article that appeared on Tuesday, the eleventh anniversary of the terrorist attacks of 9/11.
abstract: This Poetry Pairing matches "Full Flight" with by Bob Hicok with "At Ground Zero, Readers Offer Plain-Spoken Tributes to Those Lost," an article that appeared on Tuesday, the eleventh anniversary of the terrorist attacks of 9/11.
